TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HtmlContainerControl extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl
Public MustInherit Class HtmlContainerControl Inherits HtmlControl

summary.span: Serves as the abstract base class for HTML server controls that map to HTML elements that are required to have an opening and a closing tag.

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for HTML server controls that map to HTML elements that are required to have an opening and a closing tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 最常見的控制項使用的結尾標記`
`， ``， ``， `
`， ``，和``項目。The most common controls with a closing tag are the ``, ``, ``, `
`, ``, and `` elements. 並屬性可讓您管理其內容的開頭和結尾標記之間-衍生的控制項。The and properties allow you to manipulate the content between the opening and closing tags of -derived controls. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 這個類別的新執行個體不會直接建立。A new instance of this class is not created directly. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您使用屬性，以指定的開頭和結尾標記的 HTML 伺服器控制項的文字之間的文字不是 HTML 編碼。If you use the property to specify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control, the text is not HTML encoded. 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 當使用屬性，請務必驗證值以減少安全性弱點。When using the property, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. 否則，請考慮使用屬性改為。Otherwise, consider using the property instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個類別來動態產生 Web 網頁上的訊息屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of this class to dynamically generate a message on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the content found between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

span.span: Gets or sets the content found between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

value.span: 開頭和結尾標記的 HTML 伺服器控制項之間的 HTML 內容。

span.span: The HTML content between opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以程式設計方式修改內容的開頭和結尾標記的 HTML 伺服器控制項之間的屬性。Use the property to programmatically modify the contents between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control. 屬性不會自動編碼於 HTML 實體的特殊字元。The property does not automatically encode special characters to and from HTML entities. HTML 實體可讓您顯示特殊字元，例如`<`字元，瀏覽器通常會解譯為具有特殊意義。HTML entities allow you to display special characters, such as the `<` character, that a browser would ordinarily interpret as having special meaning. `<`字元會解譯為標記開頭，而且不會顯示在頁面上。The `<` character would be interpreted as the start of a tag and is not displayed on the page. 若要顯示`<`字元，您將需要使用實體`<`。To display the `<` character, you would need to use the entity `<`. 比方說，如果屬性設定為`" Hello "`，則`<`並`>`字元不會轉換成`<`和`>`分別。For example, if the property is set to `" Hello "`, the `<` and `>` characters are not converted to `<` and `>`, respectively. 仍然會轉譯的輸出： \ Hello \< /b >。The rendered output would still be: \ Hello \. 瀏覽器將會偵測``標記，並顯示文字，大家好，以粗體顯示的字型。The browser will detect the `` tags and display the text, Hello, in a bold font. > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼，因為它內嵌在 HTML 中的指令碼標記的文字。Because the text is not HTML encoded, it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果使用動態使用者輸入來設定這個屬性，請務必驗證值以減少安全性弱點。If this property is set dynamically using user input, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 安全性和使用者輸入](~/docs/standard/security/security-and-user-input.md)。For more information, see [Security and User Input](~/docs/standard/security/security-and-user-input.md). 若要提供自動的 HTML 編碼和解碼，使用屬性。To provide automatic HTML encoding and decoding, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何子控制項屬性包含值。If there are no child controls, the property contains the value . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以動態方式設定文字訊息的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to dynamically set a text message. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

span.span: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

value.span: 開頭和結尾標記的 HTML 伺服器控制項之間的文字。

span.span: The text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以程式設計方式修改文字的開頭和結尾標記的 HTML 伺服器控制項之間的屬性。Use the property to programmatically modify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control. 不同於屬性，屬性自動的特殊字元編碼於 HTML 實體。Unlike the property, the property automatically encodes special characters to and from HTML entities. HTML 實體可讓您顯示特殊字元，例如`<`字元，瀏覽器通常會解譯為具有特殊意義。HTML entities allow you to display special characters, such as the `<` character, that a browser would ordinarily interpret as having special meaning. `<`字元會解譯為標記開頭，而且不會顯示在頁面上。The `<` character would be interpreted as the start of a tag and is not displayed on the page. 若要顯示`<`字元，您將需要使用實體`<`。To display the `<` character, you would need to use the entity `<`. 比方說，如果屬性設定為`" Hello "`，則`<`並`>`符號會轉換成`<`和`>`分別。For example, if the property is set to `" Hello "`, the `<` and `>` symbols are converted to `<` and `>`, respectively. 轉譯的輸出會是： < b > Hello < b >。The rendered output would be: < b > Hello < /b >. `<`和`>`實體會指出以這些字元會顯示在頁面上的瀏覽器。The `<` and `>` entities would indicate to the browser that these characters are to be displayed on the page. 將不會偵測瀏覽器``標記，並以粗體字顯示的文字。The browser will not detect the `` tags and display the text in a bold font. 在頁面上顯示的文字是： \ Hello \< /b >。The text displayed on the page is: \ Hello \. 若要避免自動 HTML 編碼和解碼，請使用屬性。To prevent automatic HTML encoding and decoding, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何子控制項屬性包含值。If there are no child controls, the property contains the value . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何進行 HTML 編碼服務可透過屬性。The following code example demonstrates the HTML encoding service available through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法會呼叫基底類別的方法。The method calls the base class's method. 颾魤 ㄛ方法會設定屬性。In addition, the method sets the property.

summary.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法覆寫方法來呈現項目的開頭標記、 子控制項和結尾標記的控制項。The method overrides the method to render the opening tag, child controls, and closing tag of the control. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.para: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓正確呈現控制項。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is correctly rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫方法，以呈現目的結尾標記控制項。The method is called by the method to render the closing tag of the control. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.
